website_summaries.verdict: A great table to fit in with a variety of decorating styles. Rustic appeal with modern materials and construction.
pros: Long table with two storage drawers and two display shelves
Distressed wood looks worn but with new construction

website_summaries.verdict: A rustic, weather-worn-style table with ample storage.
pros: The unusual style of this table can give any room some character
A sturdy wooden build with a long design for plenty of storage
Measures 60 inches wide by 16 inches deep by 32 inches high
cons: Some customers reported that the drawers were difficult to open or came damaged

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous table Fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! It was so worth the price and it is exactly as it's pictured. The price is fantastic on amazon considering it is marked up near $700 out in town. I would never spend that on this but at $200 plus...this is fantastic price and piece. Amazon always wins my business. It was easy to put together, maybe 20-30 min tops. Just had to attach the legs & some bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PIECE!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put behind our sectional to sort of separate it from the kitchen, and it looks AMAZING! I have put all of our framed family photos on every tier to complete the look. Nailed it with this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Princess79

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together for a novice all by herself
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together for a novice all by herself. Although the finished unit is heavy and required finessing to get it safely upright so am sure that is why they suggest two people. Solid and oh so lovely looking. I love it. Yes it does have a chemical smell when you open the box but this went away overnight. There was an area on one of the back legs that was not finished completely but I put that on the back and no one will be the wiser. All in all so worth it and it is a real stand-out next to dark brown wood furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Subtly Colorful & Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Piece. We love it. Took about 2 hours for me to put together on my own. Be aware - the shelves are labeled for a reason, they are not the same size so if you put them in, in the wrong order you will end up scratching the wood by forcing it to fit. Don't make the same mistake I did. Thankfully, it's minor and i was able to fix it without further damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessaraea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: It assembled very easily and all pieces fit together well. Screw holes were open and where they should be. The instructions are a little scanty, but clear and understandable. It's fairly obvious where everything is supposed to go. It was well packaged and arrived undamaged despite some roughness in shipping. I love the trendy look. It brings some interest to my living room without breaking the bank. I took off a star because one leg is slightly too short which makes the piece unstable. I shimmed it, and it's no problem, but that's not something I should have to do with a new, factory produced piece.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture... Too bad it is so poorly built. Unpacked it to find the sides both broken off, one beyond repair. The door latches miss their catches by at least 1/4 inch -- how does a company ship something with doors that will never close? Then I spent an hour with Amazon Customer Service to get an "exception" to have UPS pick the package up instead of me having to transport. Now I start the fun process of trying to ship back a 70 pound item packaged in a way that it will never fit back in its box... Buyer beware if you fall for this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: KillerWhale

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Received box table packaged very well. Every piece was marked incorrectly. Half the washers were the wrong size and did not fit on bolts provided. Two of the legs are cracked over half way through. Once the table was assembled noticed the top drawer was warped and poorly made. The entire table is sturdy but not level. Very disappointed as I have purchased Ashley furniture before. Table is made in India. So that should say a lot. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Terrel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, only 1 drawer works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. I bought the whole set and this one is the best. It was easy to assemble. One of the drawers had a screw in the pre-assembled part that wasn’t drilled into the wood all the way to connect what it was supposed to connect and their was Ann extra screw that fell out of that drawer rolling around in it when it arrived. So that particular drawer doesn’t open or close well and needs to be handled with extra TLC. Despite that, I love the piece and use the functioning drawer rather frequently.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous table
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I have a large, open wall that needed something to break it up. And my house mainly has earth/brown tones, so I was looking for something to add some color. This table is absolutely gorgeous! I love the variety of colors on the slats and drawers. It was pretty easy to put together and everything came in perfect condition with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: solid.
customer_reviews.text: seems solid. nice to have a piece that has some real wood. easy to wipe clean. just enough low-key color to compliment my décor. not an IN YOUR FACE bright, overly tacky paint job. well, guess that's what "rustic" can mean.. ha. that being said, I want to add an aquarium to sit atop this table, but would not feel safe with anything over a 10 gallon tank.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Really like the Mestler set by Ashley
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Mestler set by Ashley. I purchased two endtables, a side table for our recliner, this piece, and the sideboard. Have received them all but the sideboard. Installation was minimal and easy. The pieces all feel sold. And I like the touch of color in the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: slcvv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece for an entry/hallway!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So happy I got this table. It's narrow about 14-16" but long about 62-64" and is perfect for my long hallway. Matches my other Ashley Mestler pieces. Lots of room for storage. Put a few pieces on it just for the picture. Now to decorate the area!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Devine

customer_reviews.title: Good table, bad shelf dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors and durability of this table. It was easy enough to put together until I reached the shelves. I enlisted my husband to help, even though it killed me to ask for help, but he confirmed my issue. Both the shelf marked "B" and the one marked "C" came the same exact size. Since the table legs are angled, we couldn't find any way to get both shelves to bolt in, one always ended up not being able to reach the tables legs. I'm bummed I can't use both shelves but the table was everything I wanted up to that point.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece, but drawers DO NOT OPEN
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful! It is a snap to assembled and is a nice quality. However, the drawers were difficult to open and at the time didn't think much of it. Note - the drawers are pre assembled so has nothing to do with the in home assembly. A month or two after I went to open the drawers and they will not open! I sent a note to Amazon and got some message back but it did not let me know what I could do to resolve the stuck drawers. I will be trying to get Amazon to resolve the situation as that is what the warranty says to do (contact seller).
customer_reviews.author: MNob

customer_reviews.title: Solid Table
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for our small TV room. The table is narrow, but sturdy enough for a TV. The shelves are a nice touch. The colors are muted and not shockingly bright like in the online photos. I took off one star because the box arrived damaged and one corner on the finished top was affected. Thankfully it was the back corner that sits along the wall and wasn't a deal breaker for me. I saved a couple hundred dollars purchasing through Amazon as opposed to the local furniture stores (including the Ashley Home Store). Overall, I am pleased and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Life in the Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunning, gorgeous piece of furniture. It's well-made and looks like reclaimed wood. It fits perfectly in my southwestern-rustic style home in Arizona. It took 45 minutes to put together. It wasn't hard with an electric screw driver. I'm using it as a TV stand but it's really too nice for that. I'd buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: ETG

customer_reviews.title: Cute, useful table
customer_reviews.text: I have a small weird entry way - was looking for something that would fit that space, could hold tall items (super high ceiling) and had some storage space. Also my coffee table has the dame motif where different slats of wood are different color - so they compliment each other nicely. It is perfect for us. Easy to assemble, looks great, quality is very good, price is good. 3 Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: locarb

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup of a great-looking table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a t.v. table for a 55 in flatscreen. It was extremely easy to put together and looks great. I don't know if this was unique to me, but it was shipped without the hardware from Ashley. Amazon helped me get in contact with the company and their receptionist seemed pretty uncaring. I got the hardware two weeks later and set up the table in nontime.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded Peasant

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This table more than exceeded my expectations. For the price (~$260) you get a solid, sturdy piece of furniture comparable to any trendy furniture or discount store (without naming names) at a fraction of the price. It fits and looks perfect where I wanted it! It is also a breeze to assemble. The hardest part is getting rid of the packaging (styrofoam, box).
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Just a perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome table! It was extremely well packaged, although heavy, and arrived with no damage. Assembly was easy, but the two shelves were miss-marked (not difficult to figure out). The table is well made and does not look cheap. The coloring is as shown. We're using it to hold a TV and are very happy with the purchase. This unit was priced higher on another site. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. Super easy to put together, only a few pieces. It did however take me a few minutes to realize that when it says to pull out the drawers to start assembly, they don't actually come out all the way. There are rubber stoppers. I thought I was doing something wrong and there must be a way to take them all the way out. Well, there isn't', you just pull them out as far as they go and from there, assembly went smoothly. Colors are great, medium tone, not too bright but not too subtle. Plus, half off the manufacturer's price!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Would like to give a higher rating but their quality control ...
customer_reviews.text: Would like to give a higher rating but their quality control is sorely lacking! One of the drawer guides was loose and the screws were missing. Found them loose in the packing material. Then, a screw had been inserted in a crooked manner in the drawer guide base requiring an effort on my part to remove it so I could put everything back together. Finish is fine and overall, it fits our need. However, I always judge a product I purchase on whether I would buy more from the seller, or recommend to a friend. The answer, unfortunately, is, NO!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It's even prettier than the picture. And very sturdy. You do have to assemble part of it but it's very easy. Took me less than an hour. Possible to do by yourself but would be easier with a second pair of hands. Came with all the parts necessary. I wish I had more room so that I could get more pieces in this line.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Collection!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I found this in the Ashley store and fell in love. The stores prices however were about double Amazon's price, so we were ecstatic when we saw it was carried on here. We get so many compliments on the collection and I would highly recommend it. The wood feels solid and the colors are perfectly muted so it doesn't seem too vibrant for a living room. It is perfect and we are so happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lila

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little time to assemble, but the finished product looks great! I added felt feet for the wood floor. You might need to place a metal washer between the wooden leg and the felt foot to level out the table.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but imperfect measurements for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece and relatively easy (if time-consuming) to assemble, except that one leg is shorter than the others and one of the holes for a screw is significantly misaligned. Considering that this isn’t basic furniture, I expected all the measurements to have been precise so I could have a sturdy and level table - unfortunately, I’ll be starting out by propping up one of the legs, which is annoying since this was meant to be an ‘upgrade’ to my current furniture. Hopefully the next pieces in the collection I’m expecting will assemble properly!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous table!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely better than we ever expected. A one of a kind piece. Love the colors and it is a very solid piece. We have it in our newly basement with a 40 inch flat screen t.v. on it. We liked it so much, we ordered 2 of the matching end tables for our couch and chaise lounge chair (which are also Ashley furniture products.)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money at all! side panel broken off - wood splintered all over the bottom - latches needed to be fixed - so sorry I bought this - looks great in picture but wood is paper thin and splinters - don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have two pieces of the Ashley Mestler line of furniture in my living room and they are very attractive. The colored slats on the shelves below are subtle yet add a touch of color that I just love. This piece of furniture is very rich looking. I added baskets onto the shelves and it looks so good. I am glad I ordered my two Mestler tables !!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received original with cracks down both sides and cracked at hinges on both side. Replacement was slightly better but still cracked at hinges and lower trim on cabtnet we're loose.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Allen

customer_reviews.title: This probably would have been a great piece of furniture had it not arrived in pieces
customer_reviews.text: This probably would have been a great piece of furniture had it not arrived in pieces. We got the couch table and loved it so, we decided to get this piece for our TV...twice I ordered and twice they arrived broken. A little soured in it now. Ashley needs to pack their stuff a little better!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine H. Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: What an Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the console table, coffee table, and side table. I was a bit skeptical, but when the product came in I was pleasantly surprised. It was so simple to put everything together, and it looks FANTASTIC. We get so many compliments on this set. The pictures are slightly different than they appear (the wood pattern) but we love it regardless. What a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive table
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my wife as Christmas gift for a coffee station in our dining room. She loves it! The table was very easy to assemble especially with a helping hand. Easy to understand instructions. Well packaged and protected. Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gullett

customer_reviews.title: Great piece  for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this purchase. Im very picky but this looks nice and study and doesnt look like cheap table Real easy to put together as well. 15 min. Only bad thing i can say is the drawers do not go out very far. But its a decorative piece not for storage. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality piece of furniture. Far exceeded my expectations. If you are thinking of purchasing this, you will not be dissapointed. Super easy assembly (I did it by myself). The box was a little dinged up but this was packed so well there was absolutely no damage to the furniture. It's heavy.... I had to unpack the box and bring it in a piece at a time. Am probably going to order the matching end table. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was intimidating with such a large heavy box but it wasn't as hard to put together as I thought it would be. The drawers were already put together, so it was just the large pieces that needed to be put together. It's really heavy wood, really well made. It looks great with the color scheme in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Salyer

customer_reviews.title: table does not fit together.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking but bottom shelf does not come close to fitting and can't screw screws tight. Big gaps with screws showing. One drawer is broken and does not work. Totally disappointed as I do not really want to return it and repackage. I think due to scratches that this may have been a previous return because it has problems. Looks great otherwise but can't use it. Be prepared if you order this table and save the packing materials!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roberts, PhD.

customer_reviews.title: The look of this product is amazing and it goes great with me hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: The look of this product is amazing and it goes great with me hardwood floor. Super easy to install. I have 14 months old and I could assemble it within an hour. It's very bulky though. The only problem I have is there are few damages to the product. I hope it doesn't cause more damage to the product in a later run.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It had a terrible odor when I received it. Still can't get the odor out of the room. Also, the doors don't close properly and the hinges are loose. Whoever assembled the doors before they shipped it, stripped the screws, and improperly installed the clips that keep the doors closed.
customer_reviews.author: michelle e callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of furniture-much better price than if bought in store. It is heavy - no particle board or MDF - you need 2 people to assemble. Furniture & price are 5 stars. Overall 4 stars due to FedEx delivering to someone else's house where it sat in the rain for 2 days. I then had to pick it up myself - not an easy task for 90 pound long box.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: This console is very well built, and it is just as pictured. Looks really good in the spot I had picked out for it.
customer_reviews.author: PHam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table I love how it looks in my living room. I decorated it already and its the focal point of my entry way when you come in my living room. It arrived ahead of scheduled and it only took about 45 mins to put together. So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of material quality upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box, we found a wooden piece had broken off and chipped away. When we pulled the wooden top frame out of the box, the blue drawer door also came off. Still a beautiful drawer...we are awaiting manufacturer response to replace.
customer_reviews.author: crazyluna

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, matches the end tables we purchased before our house was finished. It’s perfect to display my beach items in honor of my son who passed away 4/28/18.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I have order the complete set and I have to tell you I am very happy with assemble and over all look of the tables. I would order these again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the build is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the build is not good at all! When I opened the package, the face board of the drawer was damaged and detached fromt the drawer. But it was too painful to put the packaging together to return it. I have to hammer the broken piece together. After all these, some of the pieces were not even align properly. Now I have one drawer is too high and one is too low, and both doesn't slide in and out smoothly like they should have. I give it a two stars because I do like the texture of reclaimed wood. Still would like to have my money back for this broken table.
customer_reviews.author: Jason He

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, colors are spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought all three of the tables in this collection. Great quality for the price. I got all 3 for the price of 2 in local stores. Super easy assembly! The colors are exactly as depicted, muted tones but still an attractive pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Roux T

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL piece of furniture. Just like the picture, only better. Easy assembly, and good instructions. Bought it here rather than spending 100+ more at Ashley Furniture (plus shipping) and so glad that I did!
customer_reviews.author: SkreamSayonara

customer_reviews.title: It was love at first sight.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Get lots of compliments on it, very sturdy, I’ve had it for 2 years now, Yes One of the drawers is hard to open, but it’s no big deal, is not like I use it daily and just have to pull on it a little harder. Id still buy it again and again :)
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Love...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my foyer in my new home and absolutely love it. Got the matching end table for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Love the feel of the wood as it’s not particle and it’s definitely sturdy. Took me 30 min to put together by myself. Well made, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged beyond repair. Returning it or replacing wasn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged beyond repair. Returning it or replacing wasn’t an option. Do yourself a favor and buy directly from Ashley and get it in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Bill24mcc

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible! I have 4 other pieces from this line and was excited to add this one. Packaging was perfect so shame on distributor for letting an item like this out of the warehouse. Legs tilt in, paint splatter and glue globs everywhere. Doors droopy and did not line up.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: This table wasn't too bad to put together, I put it together by myself. It is very strong and well made. Love the colors. It is a bit top heavy and they give straps to secure it if you have it next to a wall. I do not and just had to make sure it would not easily tip over.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joscelyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful! It is something that will last a very long time. Did not have any problems with the color as noted in other posts. It is better than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Lucybell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to assemble, came VERY well packed. Works great as a TV stand in the living room and I love the beachy colors on the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Time consuming to put together but totally worth it. There is a slight smell to it... not overwhelming. Hopefully this will dissipate soon.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn a mcreynolds

customer_reviews.title: This table is great! Very well made and big
customer_reviews.text: It's a dark wood, which is what I wanted, so it worked out. This table is great! Very well made and big! Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful piece. Sturdy, great. This is well worth your money. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Michele Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Product Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was very disappointing when I received this item. Very damaged all corners were split and disjointed. The hinge on one door is bent beyond straightening out . Box looked like it had been dropped on at least 3 corners. this is the second table I bought that was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meredythinman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly as pictured. I am very happy with the solid quality construction. Building it was fairly straightforward as well.
customer_reviews.author: Now Dancing

customer_reviews.title: Solid, lovely side board
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful piece of furniture. Simple to put together. The one flaw is the right drawer sticks a bit. It’s hard to open and close. But I love it and it looks great in our space.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. Very sturdy and made of real wood. Easy to assemble. Fits into my decor and at a bargain price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should it wobble
customer_reviews.text: Great price (better than in store), looks good (we get tons of compliments), but one of the four legs was shorter than the others so it wobbled on our floor. I was able to get a small felt pad at a local store to wedge under the leg which keeps the table level.
customer_reviews.author: M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table at an unreal price!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed!! Solid wood and perfectly done!! Not one piece of particle board or unfinished area!! Great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Wes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Construction is fine...... Materials are fine......... Look is rustic which I like. Easy also to build. Took 15 minutes with a drill used gently. Nearly half the cost NFM charges and they do not include delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and very nice furniture
customer_reviews.text: This furniture is way too nice for the price. Easy to put together and looks like high end table. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: smiggy

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed my purchase and the door was broken off. Good job Ashley Furniture. Fast forward..received the replacement and this one too was damaged. Doors wouldn't close, hinges bent, door latches broken Don't waste your time or money on this poorly made product😡😡💩💩
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Have received several comments on how nice it looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after looking at several others, all more expensive. Have received several comments on how nice it looks. Very easy to assemble and the size is perfect plus unlike many there are two drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: I'd ordered a coffee table and end tables about 2 years ago. We needed a table to go with them. This was a perfect match, looks great! Nice sturdy, solid wood, good quality piece. My husband had no trouble at all putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Janice McEl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well built cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet and was surprised to see it on Amazon, and for a price I could afford. The cabinet is well built, and easy to assemble. It was packed unbelievably well. I would recommend this cabinet and the company that sold and shipped it.
customer_reviews.author: Krazykat

customer_reviews.title: Rich & Rustic
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleasantly surprised ! From reading the others reviews and looking at on line pics I knew I was going to like this table , but I LOVE it!!! The colors are so rich. Very solid and quality table. I love how rustic it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! I purchased it for my office. I had looked at it in the Ashley store but the price on here blew it away. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H.

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new table. It was delivered as promised, easy to put together and it fits perfect with the rest of my decor. Definitely worth the price. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: In love with this!
customer_reviews.text: SUCH a cute and unique piece of furniture. The quality is amazing and it’s super affordable. Assembly was also incredibly easy and took maybe 30 minutes or less. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Sydney S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it. It’s perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it. It’s perfect for what I needed. I like it so much I ordered coffee table and end tables and sofa table.
customer_reviews.author: Mlbgrl77

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: When the item arrived it had a cracked board on the bottom shelf. The seller partially screwed in the inside shelves so during shipping they got tossed around and cracked the pressboard. So I had to glue it back together before I could screw it in. I wish they just would have shipped it all in small pieces and let me put the entire thing together myself. They also put the door hinges on crooked and I had to take them off and fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This piece is absolutely beautiful. I give it 4 stars because it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: This piece is absolutely beautiful. I give it 4 stars because it's a pain in the butt to assemble. The first one that I received was damaged because of poop packaging.

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Mestler Rustic Sofa Table w/ Two Fixed Multi-Colored Shelves, Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:Sofa TableBring a splash of subtle color and relaxed sensibility into your space with this sofa table. Whether you’re going for an island-breeze vibe or a rustically refined look, this eclectic piece will fit right into your design scheme. The slat-style shelving dotted with a multitude of sunburnt shades sets the stage to showcase books, baskets or favorite accent pieces.
feature_bullets: RUSTIC CHIC SOFA TABLE: Rectangular accent table with a reclaimed look is perfect vintage-style living room or entryway. Features include sculpted live edge details, two slatted lower fixed shelves
RICH EDGE TREATMENT: Overall hand-applied finish with multi-tonal slatted lower shelves and drawer fronts. Aged bronze-tone hardware
SCULPTURAL FORM: Rectangular console table measures 60" W x 16" D x 32" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
NOTE: Refer user manual before use

NATURAL WEATHERWORN LOOK: Accent table crafted from veneers, wood and manmade wood. Bottom opening Width- 46.75 Inches. Bottom opening Depth- 13.50 Inches. Bottom opening Height- 8.50 Inches. Drawer interior (2) Width- 18.50 Inches. Drawer interior (2) Depth - 10.00 Inches. Drawer interior (2) Height- 3.00 Inches. Middle opening Width- 46.75 Inches. Middle opening Depth- 13.50 Inches. Middle opening Height- 9.00 Inches
